11121.content:
"Fe fi fo fum!" Elizabeth pretended, laughing hysterically as if she had become a mad woman at the end of her rope! The worst part, she was the one in control. She had the experiment right where she wanted it.

"5 little doctors come in... but none walk out." She continued.

The tiny doctors scurried away from her with each pound her huge feet made to chase after them. But their tiny little legs just would not move fast enough. In fact, one of the doctors was so close to her foot that he could hear the other doctor who was still wedged under her toe yelling! All the while he was sure he was next.

The sound of her footsteps pounded with enough force that with each step she took, she laughed at the way the doctor's bodies seem to have been lifted off the floor. It was like a jump house in here and she was just getting started. They ran for cover under the bed, under a table, inside clothes left on the floor, they even found shelter in a boot!

"Come on." She pouted, "Don't go under there."

She allowed her body to fall to the floor for further investigation. That's when she seen him there... shivering in the corner. She reached out her hand and grabbed him without a second thought!

"That makes 3 my little experiment." She taunted him, pulling his face close to hers.

Her smile was far worse than well... maybe Satan himself, and the captured doctor knew there was no getting out of this one alive. Nope, not by a long shot. And in so, he felt the warm sensation run down his inner thighs, and whimpered against her hand.

"Ew! You pissed on me!" Elizabeth yelled, and in a reflex, she threw the doctor across the room with force.

His tiny body slammed hard against the wall. A smear print of his wet pants left a tiny trail of his fate as he slid downwards toward the floor. His heart pounded against his chest. His screams, gone unheard... gone completely unrecognized. He could see her approach him, he could even see the anger in her eyes as he reached a finger to grab hold of the back of his shirt. The only dry part left.

"You'r not getting away with that!" She screamed and saved him from the fall to the unforgiving ground.

Why? Why couldn't she just put him out of his own misery and let him fall. He would of been dead on contact, but yet, Elizabeth had much, much bigger plans for him.

With a smile, she grabbed a boot nearby and shoved him inside. She pried the other two doctors that were wedged under her toes and tossed them inside the boot as well.

We can't have anymore pissing now can we?

Elizabeth scanned the large area, waiting... searching for the other 2 doctors... hidden somewhere within the room.

"Come out, come out wherever you are!" She said in a low, comforting voice.

If she could pretend to do the experiment the right way... maybe they would come out and make this more interesting. Then again, maybe not.

She got down on all fours as if a child looking for their favorite toy. I suppose in this case... what's the difference right?

Just then she spotted him!

She slowly reached for the moving shirt, got her fingers in the right spot, making sure not to make a sound... and threw it backwards. Bam! There they were hiding together.

She smiled as she grabbed both of them with each hand.

"Your making this too easy." She mused, "Hmm... were did you put that machine?"

111211.content:
"Sorry to ruin your plans, doc but I've made some of my own." Elizabeth laughed as she tossed the two small doctors into the pocket of her pants. Stepped to the door, humming a tune that one would probably never get out of their heads and then opened the door.

Inside the soft comfort, the doctors screamed as they were slammed against each other in the movements of her running to the door. Where in the world would she be going? What is she planning? And for the love of crackers, why didn't they see this coming??

Screams were heard shattering through the doc's tiny ears as they flopped about. You would think being inside something soft wouldn't feel all that bad, but... well you get the picture.

They imagined everyone's surprise as she entered into the public at her height, overshadowing the city with her plans of evil. What have they done? Not even climbing the cloth of her pants and screaming out for help would save them now.

People scattered left and right, making way for the giant girl running on a ram page and laughing like a mad women who just got away with murder- or perhaps she was excited that now was her turn. Either way...

Elizabeth played hop scotch with the tiny one's below her feet. Digging into her pocket and pulling the doctors out so that they could just what they had created. She passed building with people inside, locking the doors and hiding beneath objects so she wouldn't see. It was chaotic and there was nothing that anyone could do now.

Elizabeth came upon a building that had the words, Scientific Research Center in big bold letters. Without a second thought, she smiled brightly, ducked in the doorway, and entered into a place where she would finally make her plans a reality.

As she walked, tubes rattled on the tables, nearly pouring the bright colored fluid of its contents out. A laser, hmm... she thought- might be too messy. Testing room- interesting... testing things on humans... nice. We'll save that one for last.

"What's it going to be, fella's?" She laughed.

The doctors screamed, but all that was heard were small muffles. They jerked against her strong hold, but that didn't do any good either- she was just to big. They saw her hand cup the door knob. It turned.

The doctors scratched liek a cat in water, trying desperately to get away, but the more they moved the harder the fist crushed against their tiny bodies. They couldn't breath. They couldn't move. Their eyes bulged from the sockets by the pressure and they became still.

"That's right." She smiled, pleased.

Elizabeth opened the door and smiled at the huge room full of objects and machines that would surely serve her right with what she wanted to do. but as she walked in, she didn't see the puddle of water below her feet and she fell on her back!!! Her hand's feel to her sides and opened, releasing the small doctors. They scurried to get away...

The doctors knew they should have taken more precautions. They had seen it in all of the movies, books, and television shows. ***

Meanwhile, the doctor inside was being suffocated by the stench of Elizabeth's toes. Elizabeth knew a doctor was in their and wiggled her toes accordingly. Such a silly little tool. She finally decides to end the toy's life by slamming her giant beautiful big toe over the small doctor.

Elizabeth made her way to the yogurt sitting on the floor. Squishing people definitely worked up an appetite. She picked up the yogurt and took out the spoon she carried with her at all times for no particular reason at all. She sat down and took a spoonful of the pink squishy liquid.

***

The doctor screamed for dear life as he was brought back up to Elizabeth's mouth. Closer and closer, he got. Her sexy pink lips parted and the spoon entered the moist cavernous container. The doctor closed his eyes and braced for impact.

***

Death never came. Elizabeth cell phone had rung at the right moment. She dropped the spoon back into the white yogurt container and answered her phone. It was a text message so it didn't take long to respond. She then proceeded to pick up the spoon (with the doctor still on it) and brought it up to her mouth once again.

As she brought it to her face, she noticed the doctor crying out for dear life.

"Oh! I had no idea you were on there doctor. Are you ok?"

The doctor was relieved that the beast had a change of heart. "Yes, I'm-"

"Guess, what? I don't care!"

Elizabeth then forced the metal spoon into her mouth and sloshed around the gelatinous material and the specialized trained individual down her throat. She then sighed triumphantly.

"Stupid bitches."

You and the other doctors shrink down to a centimeter and all of you got into the boat that was already put in a protective covering.

1221.content:
"Steven! Get the hell over here! You're in her sandal!" one of the doctor's shouted in complete panic from under the couch.

Steven made his way back to the edge and prepared to take a flying leap.
"Bill, bill, junk..." Danielle said as she casually tossed each letter onto the coffee table. Out of the corner of her eye, she noticed the doctor stumbling to his feet. "Ew, GAWD, a bug!" She unconscionably raised her leg to squish it into oblivion when she noticed it had on some kind of white coating. Was it it's shell color? What bugs have four limbs and are white? Let alone run upright.

She withheld her "DANIELLE SMASH" line of dialogue and leaned in. The doctor was frantically sprinting to the couch. She got on her knees to increase her focus on the small man. Her left hand fell like mountain range in front of Steven to block his patch. He fell over from the sheer force of impact. Danielle got completely on her belly, careful not to move her arm so this "thing" could escape. "You're a little person!" her voice boomed like a dozen nuclear explosions happening at once.

"PLEASE DON'T SHOUT!" Steven pleaded, covering his ears. He knew this girl would not be ideal for such a sensitive situation.
Danielle arched her neck. Her nose only about six inches away from him, and chin completely on the cold floor. She was as close to his level as possible. From this extreme, he could see practically every pore up close. Luckily she did a good job cleansing her skin, and it was easy on the eyes. Even something at a simple range like her shoulders, started to blur from distance. He took a quick notice of the infinite blackness from her cleavage. Her boobs pressed firmly against the carpet looked like the world's highest cave.

Steven darted his eyes back up at her. Her blue eyes looked like hot tubs. "Ohmigosh. You're one of those doctor people," she said, this time withholding some excitement in tone.
"Yes. We weren't in the ship when you ate it!"
"Why did you leave? Were you guys looking through my purse??? ... and where are the other guys?"
Steven side glanced at the others under the sofa. They all made hand gestures not to say anything. "..uhh... We got separated."
"I'll help you find them! Wait here!" she boomed as she jumped up and mammoth-stepped into the kitchen. Steven felt sick from the tremendous vibrations of the floor. Like he was at sea.

She returned, crouched, and in a blinding flash, had a drinking glass set upside-down on top of him. Steven ran to the edge, feeling the inside wall of it like a simple mime.

"Ya see, THAT'S why we didn't tell her we were under here!" the first doctor told his adjoining comrades under the couch.

13.title: the guinea pig?

131.content:
You, the lead scientist, gasped at the sheer size of the girl now as she placed the tiny craft onto her tongue. you looked back to see her mammoth like teeth come down behind the capsule as she took up a glass of water and drank it, sending the capsule, and your teem down her throat, towards her stomach. The boat was more like a submarine, built to withstand any pressures and acids the human body can generate, at least you hoped.

On your team was human anatomy and biology expert Dr. Marissa Young who would be working the navigation systems. expert surgeon Dr. Samuel Stone who would be working the medical lasers for the experiment and you, Dr. John Roads, an expert in theoretical science,the one in charge of the shrinking and the mission. You and your team were to enter Ashley's digestive system to discover the cause of her condition. .

What is Ashley's condition?..
131.title: yes

choices: Ashley started to talk to you.
1311.content:
You and the crew did some research on ashley's anatomy, and figured out what the problem is: her stomach produces acid quicker, making her hungery all the time! you wondered how to fix this problem, then one of your crew came up to you.

"Maibe we could inject that medicen in her intestine." Crew suggested.

The drug?...oh yes, he was mentioning about the drug that both you and other crew were working on right now. It was an drug that makes the hunger slow down. It was sort of like slowing down the metabolism, and you have nodded.

"Alright..did you bring the medicene?" You asked.

"Why, yes sir." He replied.

He stuck his hand to his pocket and digged it for second then took out the syringe. It had some odd colored liquide inside, but it was the drug that you and others were making for few months.

"Great..now we can go to her intestine." you said.

Just as you were going to ashley's stomach...
1311.title: Hunger pain is crucial

choices: Might as well finish the rest off....slowly
...well we might as well play a.."Game"
132.content:
Ashely brings the capsule up to her mouth and is about to drop he pill inside; she pauses for a second, while holding the tiny doctor pill over her mouth...

She takes a long look at everything and everyone, she was very interested in how small they were. One of the doctors looked around as well and noticed that something was not right, part of the capsule was not closed all the way!

Ashley moved her had a small amount, but to the tiny doctors this was insurmountable; one of the doctors fell off the boat and onto the sides of the pill, then suddenly he fell through the small crack in the pill and plummeted towards Ashley's half opened mouth...

He plopped directly onto her tongue, Ashely did not see or feel him, he was far too tiny! Ashely began to talk to the crew...


"I don't know if I want to go through with this, what if something goes wrong?"

Every word she spoke sent the nearly micro sized doctor flying around her mouth like a small (very small) piece of food....

Soon enough she had to swallow..... the tiny doctor slid down her throat and she didn't feel a thing!

"What's the matter? You guys all look terrified?" Ashley questioned


"You didn't just see what you did?" One doctor asks


"Umm. no... you guys are acting weird! I'm the one that has to eat you guys, I should be the one acting weird!" Ashley respond


They tell her exactly what had happened, in detail. She asked if he would be alright... sadly they responded with a negative. The look on her gigantic face seemed confused, and a bit skeptical...

After she absorbed all the information she surprisingly said...
132.title: no

1323.content:
Ashley thought to herself. The experiment wasn't going to plan. That was entirely the reason she was here. If the doctors weren't going to do their job, then she would have to punish them. She placed the small spaceship on the floor. The doctors flooded out of the spaceship, trying to examine what Ashley was doing. They looked up and saw that the florescent light above them and eclipsed by the giant bare foot of the young girl.

"Run!"

All of the doctors ran, except for the one unlucky soul who had trouble through P.E. all throughout High School.

"No!"

His screams of terror were brought to an end under Ashely's might foot. She twisted her foot making sure that the physically disadvantaged doctor was dead. When she was done she called out to the insects that stood at her feet.

"Alright you puny bugs." Ashley called out. "Let's play a game. The first one to climb my foot gets barred from any more punishment the rest however."

She raised her big toe and hovered over each and every doctor. They understood the point. Ashley slammed her foot down in front of the doctors and they all began climbing her toes. Using the crevices in between her toes as handles, they traversed through the humid and sweaty landscape until...

All doctors made it at the same time...
1323.title: ...well we might as well play a.."Game"

info.brief_description: Tiny Doctors and a giant girl, oh how fun!
info.description:
A girl volunteers to be the subject for doctors in an experiment. They need to go inside her and conduct some research; the only way is to become very small with their shrinking device.... Does the girl have other plans though??

Characters:

Danielle (from the other story) She is usually blissfully unaware of situations and gets side tracked... that could be dangerous for the doctors... she is usually barefoot and might even want to "play around" with the doctors.
http://www.flickr.com/photos/66478077@N05/6081210620/in/photostream


Ashely: 5'8 blond girl that is very straight forward and happy, she doesn't really have any other intentions other then simply being involved in the experiment.
http://www.flickr.com/photos/66478077@N05/6080674401/in/photostream


Elizabeth: 5'10, she is a taller dirty blond girl that is interested in the experiment, not for the science, but because she wants to see tiny people. Once the experiment starts she has no intentions of having it go "according to plan."
http://www.flickr.com/photos/66478077@N05/6080672267/in/photostream
